1. Aries - 6/10 - Generally lack budgeting skills, but good at making impromptu financial decisions.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Understands the value of money and often makes smart investments.
3. Gemini - 4/10 - Spends impulsively due to curiosity, but can also be frugal when focused on a goal.
4. Cancer - 7/10 - Values stability and security, which leads to good budgeting, but may overspend on emotional spending habits.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Has natural flair for financial management, often making smart investments and enjoying financial rewards.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Analytical approach helps make wise financial decisions, with attention to detail and planning.
7. Libra - 7/10 - Emphasis on social status may lead to overspending, but also has a sense of fairness when it comes to budgeting.
8. Scorpio - 5/10 - Compulsive spending habits due to intense emotions and desire for control can hinder financial success.
9. Sagittarius - 3/10 - Spends freely without considering long-term consequences, prioritizing short-term thrills over stability.
10. Capricorn - 9/10 - Strong sense of responsibility leads to smart financial planning and investment strategies.
11. Aquarius - 6/10 - Values independence and may resist traditional financial norms, but can be resourceful in finding affordable solutions.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Can be impulsive with finances due to emotional decision-making, but also has a strong connection to intuition for making savvy investments.
